course_title: Special Topics in Religion: Pilgrimage Islam &Christianity
class_notes:
This course satisfies the Religion major requirement:- Tradition-Islam, Theme. 
Topic: Pilgrimage in Islam and Christianity
This course provides a comparative exploration of pilgrimage in Islamic and Christian traditions. Through readings and films that will take us around the world in each religious tradition, we will explore several definitions of religion, ruminate on the significance of rites of passage, learn about personal pilgrim experiences, and consider the historical development of pilgrimage sites over time. The course will cover major pilgrimages in each tradition as well as lesser known pilgrimages as well as ritual and pilgrimage in everyday life. As part of the course, students will design their own pilgrimage.
